attributes.action: Longer jail terms for Child sex crimes & child killers
attributes.additional_details:
To look into the jail terms that people who commit child killing & sex attacks currently serve. At the moment the jail terms are not long enough & there fore dont reflex the seriousness of the crime.

Killing should be mandertory life & should never be let out.

sex attacks should be min 15 years.

Neither should be let out early.
